snippet: Mr. Jones, who loved to play the music of stars like Sinatra and Ellington, was known for sprinkling his WNEW-AM broadcast with details about the singers and composers.
abstract: Bob Jones, New York radio personality, dies at age 70.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Jones, who loved to play the music of stars like Sinatra and Ellington, was known for sprinkling his WNEW-AM broadcast with details about the singers and composers.

headline.seo: Bob Jones, New York D.J. Heard on ‘Milkman’s Matinee,’ Dies at 70
headline.main: Bob Jones, New York D.J. Heard on ‘Milkman’s Matinee’, Dies at 70
headline.print_headline: Bob Jones, 70, New York D.J. Heard on ‘Milkman’s Matinee’
